briefdescription.para: Helper function for converting an HdMaterialNetwork into Riley shading nodes.

detaileddescription.para: Lights and light filters, in addition to materials, need to be able to perform this conversion.

briefdescription.para: Return the fallback surface material network description.

detaileddescription.para: This network is meant to resemble Storm's fallback material. It uses displayColor, displayRoughness, displayOpacity, and displayMetallic.
